[00:03.66]Written by：6ix9ine
[00:07.33]Producer：Wizard Lee Weinberg
[00:11.00]I'll be on the block on the regular
[00:12.82]With my n**gas busting at the cops on the regular
[00:15.44]B**ches sucking d**k giving top on the regular
[00:17.93]Catch me water whipping straight drop on the regular
[00:20.57]Yeah you know I run up with the sh*t on the regular
[00:23.01]Bare faced I'ma hit a lick on the regular
[00:25.75]Posted with the drop gun c**ked on the regular
[00:28.11]Yeah I'm 6ix9ine with the nine on the regular
[00:30.67]
[00:31.45]N**gas want war yeah kick the door yeah
[00:33.93]N**gas want the sauce yeah shake 'em off yeah
[00:36.44]I'm still in the hood yeah bussin' drugs yeah
[00:39.01]Rollin' through the city yeah with my n**gas yeah
[00:41.62]N**gas want that b**ch back I don't chit chat
[00:44.18]Run up here click clack blow your sh*t back
[00:46.73]Baby I ain't a hot boy I'm a block boy
[00:49.36]Double trigger Glock make him Diddy Bop boy
[00:51.31]N**ga we be busting at the opps on the regular
[00:53.61]N**ga we be ducking from the cops on the regular
[00:56.39]B**ches sucking d**k and giving top on the regular
[00:58.80]Sh*t that's on my wrist it cost a lot it ain't regular
[01:01.45]N**ga if it's coming from my spot it ain't regular
[01:03.93]Someone's will is on a different side it ain't regular
[01:06.45]You can't take the money when you die it ain't regular
[01:09.01]N**gas with me really ready to die on the regular
[01:11.55]Pull up to his door yeah get on the floor yeah yeah
[01:14.64]Pull up we gon' shoot don't check out the score yet
[01:17.32]Different colored coupes money on the floor yeah
[01:19.85]They know I got juice drippin' drippin' sauce yeah
[01:22.46]Pull up to his door yeah get on the floor yeah yeah
[01:24.98]Pull up we gon' shoot don't check out the score yet
[01:27.48]Different colored coupes shmoney on the floor yeah
[01:30.11]They know I got juice drippin' drippin' sauce yeah
[01:32.20]
[01:33.41]They know I'mma ball like LaVar ay
[01:35.98]'Bout to take a trip to the stars
[01:37.57]
[01:38.18]Let a n**ga drip in designer
[01:39.73]
[01:40.74]Ay makin' money flip for the mob
[01:42.36]
[01:42.97]I f**k it up I f**k it up mm yeah
[01:45.75]Schmegular that's regular mm yeah
[01:48.20]I hit it on the tour bus ooh yeah
[01:50.73]If I'm a player you a slut ooh yeah
[01:53.35]I told my 38 I love you
[01:55.13]That's my baby when I pull up she pull up too
[01:57.86]See the Hermes on the buckle and a
[02:01.08]Lotta bag in the duffle yeah
[02:03.62]Leave 'em wetter let it rain n**ga
[02:05.56]Put the thirty to your motherf**kin' brain n**ga ah
[02:08.63]I'm runnin' around with the same n**gas

data.trans:
[ti:KEKE (Explicit)]
[ar:6IX9INE/Fetty Wap/A Boogie Wit Da Hoodie]
[al:KEKE]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.46]//
[00:00.82]//
[00:00.96]
[00:01.52]//
[00:02.56]
[00:11.00]我像平时一样 来巡视我的地盘
[00:12.82]像平常一样 跟我的兄弟一起 与警察交火
[00:15.44]像平常一样 我和美女们享受欢愉
[00:17.93]像平常一样 她们都为我光鲜的外表所倾倒
[00:20.57]像平常一样 你知道我操控着一切
[00:23.01]像平常一样 我会打破那虚伪的表象
[00:25.75]像平常一样 我总是身负重器
[00:28.11]像平常一样 我坚持自己的道路
[00:30.67]
[00:31.45]兄弟们想要引起冲突 我们就破门而入
[00:33.93]兄弟们想要找点乐子 那就将他们洗劫一番
[00:36.44]我仍与穷人们打成一片 贩卖着**
[00:39.01]和我的兄弟们一起 玩转整个城市
[00:41.62]伙计们想要挽回那个美女 我不喜欢多说废话
[00:44.18]勾勾手指 就会让美女们蜂拥而至
[00:46.73]宝贝 我并不热辣性感 我是个街头男孩
[00:49.36]带着枪支 才会让我如此魅力四射
[00:51.31]像平常一样 跟我的兄弟一起 与警察交火
[00:53.61]像平常一样 我们躲避着警察的袭击
[00:56.39]像平常一样 我和美女们享受欢愉
[00:58.80]我手腕上佩戴的手链价值连城 可不是随处可见的便宜货
[01:01.45]如果是我的地盘上出来的兄弟 那他一定非常优秀
[01:03.93]每个不随波逐流的人都是好样的
[01:06.45]你所拥有的财富 生不带来死不带去
[01:09.01]我们也会像平常人一样走入死亡
[01:11.55]破门而入 进入他的住所
[01:14.64]我们会随意扫射 根本不在乎目标
[01:17.32]不同国家的钞票散落一地
[01:19.85]人们都知道这对我来说不过是小菜一碟
[01:22.46]破门而入 进入他的住所
[01:24.98]我们会随意扫射 根本不在乎目标
[01:27.48]不同国家的钞票散落一地
[01:30.11]人们都知道这对我来说不过是小菜一碟
[01:32.20]
[01:33.41]人们都知道我所向披靡
[01:35.98]我的能力不可估量
[01:37.57]
[01:38.18]让我做好战前规划
[01:39.73]
[01:40.74]我们会发动袭击 来赚取财富
[01:42.36]
[01:42.97]我是如此所向披靡 大杀四方
[01:45.75]我会实现所有的不可能
[01:48.20]我在观光车上也享受着欢愉 根本不在乎别人的眼光
[01:50.73]我们是如此天生一对
[01:53.35]我告诉我的爱人 我很爱她
[01:55.13]她是我的爱人 她会与我共赴云雨
[01:57.86]看我腰间的爱马仕腰带
[02:01.08]背着奢侈品包包
[02:03.62]让所有美女都为我倾倒
[02:05.56]让你们都为我疯狂吧
[02:08.63]我永远与我的兄弟们团结一致
[02:10.58]我会永远和我的兄弟们并肩作战
[02:13.28]//
